example.parse: (S (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN_PROP سمعان) (DET+NOUN_PROP الخوري)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اقترح) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN وزارة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الداخلية)))) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC تسجيل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN فئة) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الدم)))) (PP (PREP على) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN رخصة) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN قيادة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_DEF_GEN السيارات))))))
